key.name: font-size
key.description: The size of the font used in the editor. (Small, Medium, Large)

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: Show line numbers on the side of the editor.

key.name: hilight-curr-line
key.description: Highlight the current line in the editor.

key.name: hilight-brackets
key.description: Highlight matching brackets in the editor.
